title: Dungeon+Harem+Master - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Psychological   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Dungeons   Elves   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Netorare   Netori   R-18   R*pe   S*aves   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Mishima Chihiro
description:
A man’s true worth is to entertain the beauties of the world. Summoned to a different world called Romless, the college student Simon Claud (or Shimon Kurando) aims for women, treasures, and adventures while running around labyrinths, deserts, and cities.

'Young ladies, princess knights, beast girls, elves,  female assassins; I’ll get them all!' The most absurd dark fantasy is now unveiled. Men must adventure until their death!>
